item.title: This Terrible Gangster Movie Starring Robert De Niro Came Out Just 1 Year Before The Godfather & Almost Featured Al Pacino Instead
item.description: A year before The Godfather revolutionized the crime genre, Robert De Niro replaced Al Pacino in the cast of a critically panned gangster comedy.

item.title: My Hopes For Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves 2 Just Received A Major Boost, 2 Years After The $208M Box Office Letdown
item.description: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves deserves a sequel, and I think there is still a way that it can happen, considering D&D's popularity.

item.title: Freya Allanâ€™s Planet Of The Apes Character Will Be The One To Break An Annoying Franchise Trend In The Next Movie
item.description: After Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes, it seems almost inevitable that Freya Allen will break an irritating decade-long Planet of the Apes trend.
